content: Which 1977 science fiction film, directed by George Lucas, spawned a massive franchise that includes numerous sequels, prequels, and spin-offs?

That would be "Star Wars: Episode IV - A New Hope," released in 1977 and directed by George Lucas. This film indeed ignited a cultural phenomenon and led to an extensive franchise encompassing multiple sequels, prequels, and spin-off movies, as well as a vast array of literature, television shows, video games, and merchandise. The Star Wars universe has become one of the most successful and influential franchises in the history of entertainment.
